name: Mushroom Guardian
description:
The evil Frog King and his army are trying to steal the magic mushrooms! Aim, shoot, jump, roll and fly in this amazing action-packed, old-school platform adventure and restore the forest before the trail gets cold! The Village needs your best skills to succeed! Duty calls!

Features:

- 20 levels of fast-paced action!
- Challenge a friend in the two-player Archery mini-game or play solo and test your skills!
- Unique combination of classic gameplay mechanics: Aim, shoot, jump, fly and roll!
- Cheerful and amazing graphics!
- Easy to learn, as modern endless runners!
- Hard to master, like old retro platformers, a true blast from the past!
- Epic Orchestral Soundtrack.
- Achievements and Leaderboards!
